text:
Ginger Tea one of the best I always try here.

Beauty of this Fun Toast is it has both Indoor and outdoor dine in options. If any feels cold can dine out side , if feels hot can sit inside.

Kaya and french roast breakfast sets are popular must try along with Ginger Tea.

TGIF ! If you are looking a distance of 3km … good traditional coffee ☕️! Here is the place . Do expect boutique service … when they are not busy . Love ❤️ Zen quiet place- gather my thoughts for day .

The cashier auntie is da best always tolerate my nonsense. Crowded during lunch but the drinks are value for money imo. The straw don’t know why so big they don’t have boba drinks need to save the earth.
I am a regular at Fun Toast at Downtown MRT station and was thrilled to see this open in CBP.. coffee standard is superb and same as we get in other fun Toast outlets..

Awesome cafe for local hot brewed beverages.
Loved the cooked snacks too.
Cool clean bright ambience.
